title: SEPTRE Electronic Protocol Tool
cleaned_text: Find out what The Global Health Network can do for you. [Register now.](//globalhealthtrials.tghn.org/signup/) SEPTRE (SPIRIT Electronic Protocol Tool and Resource) is an innovative, web-based software solution that makes it easier to create, manage, and register high-quality protocols for clinical trials. Now researchers based in low resource settings can use the SEPTRE tool for free via The Global Health Network. The developers of SEPTRE at the Women's College Research Institute, University of Toronto have partnered with The Global Health Network to provide access to the tool based on a needs assessment. For organisations or individuals based in high income countries or institutions, we request that you apply via the main [SEPTRE request form](https://www.spirit-statement.org/).
